body.name: Super Large Gel Seat Cushion for Long Sitting - 19inch Office Chair Car Seat Wheelchair Cushion for Coccyx, Sciatica, Back, Tailbone Pain Relief - Cool, Soft & Breathable Pillow with Non-Slip Cover
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 23 hrs 51 mins
features: 【Large & Thick】 This gel seat cushion for long sitting is specially designed super large, upgraded size to 19*17.92 inches, which is larger and thicker than other gel cushions, can better match with your chair, make your seat more comfortable.

【Relieve Pressure & Pain】This gel chair cushion perfectly fits curve of hip, soft and without losing support force. Effectively relieves back pain, low back pain, sciatica and other issues caused by sitting for long periods of time.

【Breathable and Cool】Advanced cooling gel with unique honeycomb design. This gel cushion for wheelchair is composed of thousands of air columns, perfect structure to keep the seat pad breathable. With air circulating quickly, bring your buttock coolling. It allows you to reduce sweating on your hips even in the chair.
【Removable & Washable Non-Slip Cover】The gel cushion include a textured bottom cover to ensure minimal to no movement in most seat. The zipper design cover also can be taken off for washing.

【Widely Application】This multifunction desk seat cushion suitable for various use scenarios: Office Chair, Computer Desk, Kitchen, Dining Room, Living Room, Patio, Couch, Recliner, Car, Truck, Train & Airplane Travel, Classrooms.

【Our Brand Promise】Enjoy comfort to the fullest and not have to worry about butt pain from sitting on hard surfaces again. Give our Helishy Super Large seat cushions a try. If you are not satisfied, we'll provide a full refund!
body.description: Specification: Item Mame: Gel Seat Cushion Material: Gel Size: 48.26*45.5/19*17.92 Weight: about 1300g/2.8LB Package Include: 1* Blue Seat Cushion; 1* Black Cover Features: 1. Restains Its Shape - Gel seat cushion won't lose its support even after long term use 2. Fits Most of Chairs - Support in your computer chair, office chair, deep seat, car seat, or recliner 3. With Cover - Included a zipper design washable non-slip cover

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wish they were made bigger for large recliners. Over all my dad likes the comfort of it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I sit a lot and bottom gets sore. I have tried several different cushions but after just a couple of hours I had to sit on something else because they didn't help for long. This cushion is the only one that I have been able to use continuously. Good purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's not as thick or firm as expected. It slides on my chair do I have to adjust it a couple times a day. It is comfortable and possibly cooler than just sitting on the chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Compresses too easily
reviews.reviewText: Not enough gel. It is compressed within minutes rather than remaining supportive. I weigh 218, which should not be a problem. Back to the drawing board.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Large enough for American builds, and well thought out.
reviews.reviewText: The size is perfect for adults, and fits a normal chair well, which is important when sitting for prolonged periods. Other pads were simply too small for a 6' 300 pound man.Second nice thing here is the cover that comes with it. One side is light and vented, a silky smooth. The other side is covered with little rubber speckles. The rubber dots SEEM like a massage texture thing, BUT ITS NOT. Nope, flip it over and you find they grip chairs amazingly well so the pad stays put when you get up/down from your chair. I've seen covers with straps and other awkward velcro patchs... but this is perfect.Highly reccomend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars I switched back to my regular foam cushion!
reviews.reviewText: • This Helishy gel seat cushion is 19x17.92 inches. It has OPEN cells, as shown in the photos, that are supposed to provide cushioning. I found they just squashed down to about ¼ inch. There is nothing to keep the air in the cells. I switched back to my regular foam cushion and stopped using this gel seat cushion.• The gel cushion includes a textured-black bottom cover that can be washed. If you are not satisfied, they claim they will provide a full refund!• Vine review products are sent to me without paying Amazon for it. Everything I get is reported as income to me, so I will have to pay income taxes on the list price. I pay for them, just not to Amazon. I may actually lose on the deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get the largest one offered (blue). Green is good for office chair.
reviews.reviewText: I had gotten the "green" cushion. Unfortunately, it wasn't BIG enough to cover a typical Honda seat.Don't get my wrong there's just enough space for the Green one to work well and it is thinner than the largest one so it's soft to sit on.I did have an issue with the size of it. I needed larger as I'm sat in my car for 10 hours plus a day. The seller reached out to me and help rectify MY ISSUE in record time.With that being said I highly recommend getting the LARGEST one that the seller offers.Also as a side note: because the largest one is actually THICKER as well... The largest one is not as soft. I am fine with that as it's more about needing support at pressure points. So keep in mind when some of these reviews say "it's hard to sit on", well yeah the largest unit is also thicker therefore causing the cushion to feel harder. Don't confuse more SUPPORT for the unit being harder. It's just the dynamics of a thicker supporting honeycomb grid.Definitely get these as the seller alone is worth the price of admission. Again I HIGHLY RECOMMEND getting the largest (blue) one for the car. The green one works very well for an office chair.
